app_descript:
CountThings from Photos

CountThings from Photos is an innovative app designed to streamline and enhance industrial operations by providing automatic counting of items through photo analysis. Ideal for Quality Assurance professionals, this app ensures fast and precise counts, transforming the way you manage incoming materials or outgoing product shipments.
